textChoices: Understand how to use REDCap Cloud for Mobile ePRO Studies

questions.prompt: My name will be stored with my study data.

sections.sectionSummary: This simple walkthrough will explain the research study, the impact it may have on your life and will allow you to provide your consent to participate.
To better understand your evolving health, we will ask you to respond to brief weekly surveys about your quality of life and health status.
We will ask you to share your steps per day as tracked by Healthkit on your iPhone and/or other devices that sync to your Apple Health app.
This study will take about 10 minutes per week.
We will replace your name with a random code. The coded data will be encrypted and stored on a secure Cloud server under the control of the Study Administrator to prevent improper access.
Your study data collected from surveys and sensors will be combined with similar data from other participants.
Your coded data will not be used for research and may be shared with researchers within Genentech and Roche.
Your participation is voluntary. You may withdraw your consent and discontinue participation at any time.
You will be able to visualize your sensor data and potentially learn more about trends in your health.
This research is not a treatment study.  Some questions may make you feel uncomfortable. Simply do not respond.
Participating in this study could generate a wide range of emotions.
We will make every effort to protect your information, but total anonymity cannot be guaranteed.
